data.title: Anwar Sadat, Cairo, Egypt letter to Audrey Flack, New York, N.Y., 1978 Apr., from the Audrey Flack papers, 1950-2022
data.meta_description: Sadat writes on presidential letterhead to thank Flack for the portrait she painted of him.
data.text:
Item Information

Title: Anwar Sadat, Cairo, Egypt letter to Audrey Flack, New York, N.Y.

Date: 1978 Apr.

Physical Details: Letter : 1 p. : typescript ; 26 x 21

Description: Sadat writes on presidential letterhead to thank Flack for the portrait she painted of him.

Creator: Sadat, Anwar, 1918-1981

Forms part of: Audrey Flack papers, 1950-2022

Rights Statement: Current copyright status is undetermined

Citation Information: Anwar Sadat. Anwar Sadat, Cairo, Egypt letter to Audrey Flack, New York, N.Y., 1978 Apr.. Audrey Flack papers, 1950-2022. Archives of American Art, Smithsonian Institution.
